lenders.name: Frances
lenders.loan_because: making a small loan is a way to show someone that I care--even when I don't know the person.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of our house and yard.  I also serve as a volunteer at a school.  My dog and I visit people in retirement homes and nursing homes.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Do my little part

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a chance

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I have some money to spare right now, and I would like for that to be benefiting the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I study crystals using light.  This may help to make better computers or solar panels one day.  I also keep bees.

lenders.name: Artie Isaac
lenders.loan_because: What goes around comes around. And our purpose is "tikkun olam," completing the act of creating this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I lead brainstorming and idea generation projects for companies. I teach and write a blog site on creativity and ethics. I also co-founded SpeakerSite.com, where you can join the world's largest social network of public speakers.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.occupational_info: student of communication and expression in as many forms as I can juggle

lenders.name: Andrew H
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes opportunity is all you need.

lenders.name: Kelsey
lenders.loan_because: It is a sustainable way to support people--lots of people--around the world in business endeavors that they may not otherwise be able to undertake.  Kiva lenders are helping them challenge themselves, help their family, grow their community, and improve their quality of life.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: it takes more to create then it does to destroy.
lenders.occupational_info: I use math and science to understand the world around us, hoping to improve the human condtion through the application of science and technology to medicine.

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: Because my luck in life should not be limited to just me.  A lot of people deserve things that they do not have.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I want to give a little something back, and help those who are really trying to make it in this tuff world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office doing corporate & executive relocations domestically & Internationally. I try and think globally, but try and act locally. as well.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: We have to empower peopel, but particularly women in developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an advocate and supporter for workers' and women's rights.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I can. I've struggled to get ahead, to make my life better. Someone helped me, and I'm now able to help someone else
lenders.occupational_info: I help people that telephone my company for assistance with our website and our products when they are malfunctioning - the products, not the people!

lenders.loan_because: It's important to help others be self-sufficient when you can

lenders.loan_because: Matthew 25:40

lenders.name: Rebecca

lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Operation Smile mobilizes a world of generous hearts to heal children’s smiles and transform lives across the globe. Our network of volunteers works worldwide to repair childhood facial deformities including cleft lips and cleft palates.

lenders.name: jan
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to share with others
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I own an agricultural tire business.  We employ our son and son-in-law along with two handicap persons.

lenders.loan_because: I believe in women having the opportunity to reach their potential

lenders.occupational_info: very studious.

lenders.name: Alison

lenders.name: Russ

lenders.name: Jme & Tim

Tim teaches people about recycling and works to improve recycling programs.

Jme works to make places healthier for people, particularly poor people.    She does research to help people understand how cities and other places can be improved, and works on projects to help improve them.

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: I want to help, in some small way,  those less fortunate, especially women.  I admire their determination and courage.

lenders.name: Luis
lenders.occupational_info: I am the general manager of EDESA, a rural microfinance institution in Costa Rica.

lenders.name: Dr. Joanne
lenders.loan_because: it is our duty to help others through empowerment not enablement.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a researcher at Arizona State University and the CEO of an international nonprofit group, the MISS Foundation.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: "We can't solve problems by using the same kind of thinking we used when we created them." - Albert Einstein

lenders.name: Maleny Volleyball Group
lenders.loan_because: We put a little money away each week after our weekly volleyball game to support Kiva. We see it as a great way to support those who really need a loan.
lenders.occupational_info: We also hope that someone from our group may someday travel to Cambodia to visit some of you.

lenders.name: Mark & Ilse
lenders.loan_because: As followers of Jesus Christ, it is our passion to bless others w/ no expectations in return. Our loan includes a commitment to pray for the entrepreneurs with whom we partner. We ask that God will bless them in profound ways and reveal His love for them.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: people should not be denied the chance to make a better life for themselves just because of their financial situation.

lenders.occupational_info: I do not have a job because i' m 10 years old. I live in Vietnam and my school is named ISHCMC (International School Ho Chi Minh City)

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Bev
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I cannot work as I am on dialysis for kidney failure but in my country the government supports me very well so I'd like to help others to help themselves and combat the evil of poverty

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because:
Wants to get some good Karma;)

Nice to help people when it really can change a lot of peoples lives, for some money that doesnt really matter too much for myself.
lenders.occupational_info: Gambler:P

lenders.name: Tania
lenders.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to be born in a country where I do not struggle from day to day. If I can help someone else achieve their goal & their dream then sign me up! I believe we are all here to help each other. Share the humanity & spread the love.
lenders.occupational_info: Quite mundane office work tho I also study part time and run a small massage business from home.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I have been assisted myself by various kindnesses through life  now i can return by giving back. It feels good & when  something good happens to me I lend to another in gratitude.Love being able to help those that large corporates will not.I also get great joy when i see a loan fully funded & anothern individual Or group on their way to production. Good on Kiva
lenders.occupational_info: Work in Horticulture prefering plants to humans

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I realize that it takes all of us to make the world a better place and that by helping someone realize their potential, we are all better off.
lenders.occupational_info: Through my business, I help businesses and organizations target market to their customers and to thank staff, clients and volunteers.

lenders.name: Leigh and John
lenders.loan_because: We have been looking for a suitable organisation to enable us to contribute in some small way to developing enterprises.  We see Kiva as a means to assist enterprising people achieve their life goals.
lenders.occupational_info: Primary school teacher & helping people achieve home ownership

lenders.name: Noel
lenders.loan_because: I hope it makes the world a better place for someone trying to improve their life.

lenders.name: Verena
lenders.loan_because: I have lived in Tanzania for 6 months in 2004 and 6 months again in 2008. I have seen how fortunate I am, and how much difference can be made in Tanzania through micro-finance loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children who come from broken families and sometimes lack positive influences in their lives. I also work with adults who have intellectual disabilities.

lenders.name: Juan
lenders.loan_because: am a product of opportunity. I was given the chance to rise above, regardless of all the struggles my mother and brother had to go through to help me become a professional. I immigrated to the United States in 1988 from San Salvador, El Salvador. I was 14 years old, and my mother and brother put me through high school. At the age of 18 and after high school I stated working for a construction company building roads. I felt it was almost impossible for me to go to college due to my legal status in the United States; however due to an incident where I herniated my S1 disc in my lower back. I was not able to physically work any longer. My mother and brother gave me the opportunity to enter a community college where I received my associates degree. After graduation, I got married to my wonderful wife, who was also going through the same struggles. She helped me and I became a legal resident and I was able to obtain financial aid and went to graduate from one of the world’s best engineering schools, Rochester Institute of Technology. After 5 years of hard work and graduating from RIT, I passed my engineering license exam and became a License Professional Engineer in the state of NY. So, this my life story and I hope to assist others overcome their struggles and provide some evidence that with hope and hard work all your goals can be obtained.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Civil Engineer that provides consulting services to small and medium construction project in Long Island, NY.

lenders.name: Nikki Gore
lenders.loan_because: I believe in supporting those who, despite whatever challenges they are facing, are truly committed to being successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I help technology companies with their marketing plans and activities.

lenders.name: Burke
lenders.loan_because: To make the world more self-sufficient
lenders.occupational_info: I build information technology

lenders.name: Carroll's
lenders.loan_because:
Helping others is a command. Matt 25:35-36
35 For I was hungry and you gave me food, I was thirsty and you gave me drink, I was a stranger and you welcomed me, 36 I was naked and you clothed me, I was sick and you visited me, I was in prison and you came to me.
lenders.occupational_info: We are active with Church of Christ, bible courses,& jail ministry.  Also family Genealogy, history, fishing, hiking and Bee Keeping.

lenders.name: Veronica
lenders.loan_because: I have the money to share and like that its being put to good use.  I know the importance of sharing the wealth, if no one shared with my parents, my family would not be where it is right now.

lenders.name: Travel2help.org
lenders.loan_because: We want to give back to Peru, Brazil, India, South Africa, Tanzania & Kenya where our volunteers travel and spend their time in improving the conditions of local communities.
lenders.occupational_info: We serve people who want to spend their vacation by volunteering in local projects and charities in developing countries.

lenders.name: June
lenders.loan_because: How can I not?  The old saying may be trite but it is true:  You're either part of the solution or you're part of the problem.  Inaction is a problem.

lenders.name: Chris and Erin
lenders.loan_because: We like the idea of being able to help others, and to make a difference with an amount of money that is relatively small (at least, within the US).
lenders.occupational_info: Chris makes sure history is preserved when governments and private agencies expand. Erin makes sure people who want to know more about her university have accurate information and keeps databases running smoothly.

lenders.name: Tayvwiya (2persons)
lenders.loan_because: Because I have been given much.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: Long ago someone believed in me and loaned me money to finish school. Since then, I have tried to help where I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked for others and for my country. In retirement, I garden and I bake bread.

lenders.name: Glenda
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help enable someone when their circumstances may hinder them from achieving a better way of life and supporting themselves, their families, and their communities. It may be only a small amount, but in Kiva, there is a community behind each entrepreneur, making that seemingly small amount something much larger and more impactful. What a phenomenon this has become! I'm happy to be a part of it all.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: Seems like a fun thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Working on a PhD, my thesis is on figuring out how to clean natural gas.

lenders.loan_because: I want to

lenders.loan_because: I like to help small businesses, especially woman-owned ones.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a government agency that oversees and regulates lawyers in the state of Washington. I write and edit articles for our monthly magazine, write and send news releases to newspapers, and work on our website.

lenders.name: Gregory Stromberg
lenders.loan_because: I want to be of service and help those in need who want to help themselves. It also makes me feel good when I can return more value than what I receive.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social intrapreneur that  runs a charity called cannedwater4kids.org & a toy  company that supports this charity called  www.toobee.com

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I can help women to work independently, use their potential and grow healthier families. It makes me feel great to know that I am a part of something much bigger than myself and my own family.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a multi-tasker -- mom, language learner and story-teller.  Over the past 15 years I've contributed online content for business and not-for-profit orgs.  I love new ideas and making a difference through my work in communications.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: what goes around comes around. It's the thing to do. If only everyone would ....

preciso prestamo para hacer compras de mercaderias en europa para luego venderlas a mi pais en mercadolibre. es un muy buen negocio, es totalmente rentable

excellent! I like what I do. I want to overcome even more

excelente!! me gusta lo que hago. me quiero superar aun mas

lenders.name: Paula

My daughter Paula, 15, died from cancer. She wanted to donate the money and I will continue with her wishes.
Father Zdravko

lenders.occupational_info: I write software that enables people to electronically send money around the world.

lenders.name: Tim & Steph
lenders.loan_because: We are very grateful for what we have, others who work hard should have opportunities

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: All today's discussion about a Financial Crisis makes me angry. I live in Europe/The Netherlands and nobody here is starving from hunger. Almost everybody does not have to worry about the next day survival. 90% Of the worlds population always worry about the next day survival.  With my loan I can make it possible that people can have less worries about the next day to come. Instead of a uncertain day I can give them courage to face the next day, week, month, year.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social worker in a town of 200.000 inhabitant in The Netherlands. I support and help people to improve their neighborhood and to find co-workers in their part of the town who have the same objectives. Projects as social housing improvement as well as traffic-actions. Influencing the local politicians or the social-housing companies to be aware of bad situations. Also the living together of many different cultures in this part of the town can cause problems. With my help these problems are made aware and can be dealth with. Together with other professionals (Police, SocialServant, Medical Care, etc.) I confront the problems in order to solve them together with the people involved.  The new yell from Obama "Yes, we can" is a sort of personal yell for me during the past years. And it helps!

lenders.name: Walker
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info:
I aim to send out good energy to counter some of the bad I see... 
it's a vicious cycle, but somebody's gotta do it!

lenders.name: Pasha
lenders.loan_because: I'm a good girl.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Paying forward my blessings to another is my honor.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the water industry,

lenders.name: Helena
lenders.loan_because: "Many hands make light work."

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I believe each one of us can be the change we wish to see in the world.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: Because I've traveled in and learned so much in various developing countries and because people have reached out a hand to help me in the past, enabling me to accomplish more than I could have on my own.  I am very impressed with Kiva, making it so easy for me to make a loan and follow in these projects.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist, working with metal.

lenders.name: Zachary
lenders.loan_because: It helps

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: Because I can and should help others in need to better themselves and families.  A little jump start is all many need to succeed.  On a selfish note, it really feels good!
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for Anheuser-Busch InBev in Columbus, Ohio.  I have worked here for 35+ years making beer.  A great job and making beer is still fun today!

lenders.name: Rick

lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers and other IT stuff. I am systems administrator to a large U.S. metropolitan hotel.

lenders.loan_because: I have worked with many people in similar situations to those seeking loans through KIVA and I know what an enormous difference this type of moral, technical and financial support can make

lenders.name: Chase
lenders.loan_because: I love the feeling of helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist and I do all of the things that I love to make my living......

lenders.name: Margit
lenders.loan_because: I'm able to do it and this is a great way to help other people in less fortunate  situations  ....and it makes me feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: I design living and work places for all kinds of different people. It`s part of my contribution to make this world a better place.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help people who are working to improve their lives and can use a "boost".
lenders.occupational_info: I manage people who provide technical support to others in the computer industry

lenders.name: Murray H.
lenders.loan_because:
Those most in need do not qualify for any loan by conventional means, yet these people are often the most sincere and hard working, they just need a break to get going.
I continue to see first hand how banks refuse money to good hard working honest people while at the same time lose millions on loans they never should have made.  Through Kiva we can be the lender and approve the loans ourselves.  Take a chance, you may be surprised.  The average loss rate is below 1%, so far I have all my loans performing well and many repaid.
lenders.occupational_info: I help Canadian people achieve wealth through smart use of quality investment management.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I have the financial means to travel, which brings me riches far beyond just the financial & material. Travelling has afforded me an insight into how much difference small gestures of goodwill can make...

lenders.name: Ful
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people to make dreams come true.

lenders.name: Christoph
lenders.loan_because: I hate the long time fucked-up structures of our world which could be so peaceful, beautiful and great if everybody would just work on it while forgetting the subjective interests for a time. As a single person I cannot change a lot, but I can at least try to.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage hardware-based and virtual machines (computers) for large companies in Southern Germany. Currently I administrate about 400 Windows-Servers used to test software builds on.

lenders.name: Osamu
lenders.loan_because: I hope for the health and happiness of all your family members! Keep your smile!

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed with great parents who have provided me with a comfortable life. Now that I am becoming my own person, I would like to give others the opportunity to live comfortably or get on the right path.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full-time student at The University of Texas at Austin studying accounting and finance. I will graduate in May 2010 with both my Bachelors and Masters degrees in Accounting.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because:
I have so much in my life and I want to share what I have with others. 

After all ... we all are one!

lenders.name: Lynda

lenders.name: Robert

lenders.occupational_info: I meet and greet people who work where I am at and am many times the first face they see that morning.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: I started giving to Kiva  at Thanksgiving 2008.  Helping others to have a chance at prospering makes it easier for me to appreciate all I have to be thankful for.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: My ancestors were entrepreneurs. They worked hard, and with the help of friends and family, they succeeded.
lenders.occupational_info: I write and teach history.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that each of us can make a difference. I really learned that lesson from a 6 year old boy called Ryan who raised money for a well in Africa..12 yrs later he's built hundreds of wells in several countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I make documentaries and factual tv programs. We try to tell stories that make a difference, inform and inspire and entertain.

lenders.name: Ari
lenders.loan_because: The Jewish Rabbi Maimonides wrote that that the highest level of charity is to "'strengthen the stranger and the dweller in your midst and live with him,' (Leviticus 25:35) that is to say, strengthen him until he needs no longer fall [upon the mercy of the community] or be in need" (Maimonides, Mishneh Torah, "Laws of Gifts of [that belong to] the Poor," 10:1).
lenders.occupational_info: Uri L'Tzedek is an Orthodox social justice organization guided by Torah values and dedicated to combating suffering and oppression.  Through community based education, leadership development and action, Uri L'Tzedek creates discourse, inspires leaders, and empowers the Jewish community towards creating a more just world.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to get a loan from a bank sometimes.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a mobile music company

lenders.name: jOHN
lenders.loan_because: even selfishly, raising others' quality of life around provides us greater prosperity. And, paraphrasing many, "we should judge our civilization by how we treat our world's weakest members."
lenders.occupational_info: I protect people from risks resulting from the technology they use.

lenders.name: Trista
lenders.loan_because: this changes lives.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel better about my job to know that I am sharing the money with people who need help.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: Citizens of developing nations have little to no access to traditional banking services at reasonable rates. Helping to add just a little bit of liquidity and good vibes to the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: Accountant

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: i think that micro-loaning is a great way to help developing countries.  The people who get these loans can really make a difference in their community.  I think it is smarter and more productive then flat donations.
lenders.occupational_info: I work part time at a small bookstore.  I work as a cashier and restock the books.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to support others who have less than myself. I believe in hard work & it touches my heart DEEPLY to read these womens stories.
lenders.occupational_info: Home Business > I buy overstock Health & Beauty Items from a local Home Shopping Club OUTLET & re-sell items on EBay.  ALSO I have been selling Herbal Supplements for over 12yrs & have many GREAT customers & friends.

lenders.name: Kid Lenders
lenders.loan_because: We are three very fortunate children who have everything we need/want - food, a home, lots of toys.  It is our goal to contribute money to others in the hope that they will become successful and fulfill all of their dreams.
